title: Poster, "Poster Design for the Jewish Museum ""The Michael M. Zagayski Collection of Ceremonial Arts"", 1963
title_raw: Poster Design for the Jewish Museum ""The Michael M. Zagayski Collection of Ceremonial Arts"
inscribed:
Imprinted vertically at lower right in red ink: Elaine Lustig
Imprinted at left center in black ink: The/ Michael M. Zagayski/ Collection/ of/ Ceremonial/ Art
On the upper right: The/ Hebrew/ Bible/ in Christian/ Jewish/ and Muslim/ Art
Across the bottom: The Jewish Museum [bold] under the auspices of the Jewish Theological Seminary of America
At lower right: Reopening February 18/ March 21, 1963/ Monday-Thursdays 12 am-5 pm/ Sundays 11am-6 pm/ Admission tree/ 1109 Fifth Avenue, New York City
provenance: Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff; 1993: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Poster design for the Jewish Museum "The Michael M. Zagayski Collection of Ceremonial Arts." The poster has a red on red design of alternating horizontal and vertical stripes.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "Poster Design for the Jewish Museum ""The Michael M. Zagayski Collection of Ceremonial Arts"", 1963. Lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-81.
